Constructor Detail

JsonFieldHandlerRegistry

public JsonFieldHandlerRegistry()
Construct a new instance of this class and registers the initial field handlers.

Method Detail

registerInitialFieldHandlers

protected void registerInitialFieldHandlers()
Registers the initial field handler for the json reader. The following handlers are registered:
  • BooleanFieldHandler
    • boolean, Boolean
  • NumberFieldHandler
    • byte, Byte
    • short, Short
    • int, Integer
    • long, Long
    • float, Float
    • double, Double
  • ConverterFieldHandler
    • char, Character
    • Date
  • StringFieldHandler
    • String
  • CollectionFieldHandler
    • Collection
    • List
    • ArrayList
    • LinkedList
    • Set
    • HashSet
    • SortedSet
    • TreeSet
